author: Samiksha Castle
title: getaway from Mumbai (Help)
text: # 1 Hello, I've got a good 4 day off from work in October. And even tho its a short time, I need to getaway and hence would like your opinion of what place I could go to? Please don't suggest lonavala, panchgani, alibaug, mahabaleshwar etc. Having lived in Mumbai forever. Of course I've already been there haha I was thinking of Gokarna but I'm not quite sure now. I don't want to travel more than 7 hours. Hereby giving me more time to explore. Can anyone anyone be of any help? Please. Thanks. Here's to nothing,
